title: Vess Professional Hair Blow Brush Pro-2000 Ceramic 9 rows Wide Type-English Instruction Manual-Made in Japan
features: Its brush combs your hair very naturally as its nylon hair with round tips soft on your scalp is structurally independent of the base; its nylon hair will move smoothly along your scalp in sync with your blowing.
Its implanted rubber-hair part is made of thermos-rubber with best possible resilience and heat-resistance; it’ll give you soft elasticity when you blow.
It handle hardly slips for its soft-leather-like processing, making its handling ever easier, a.k.a. “Nine-digit Blow Brush”.
t comes with highest comfort that impresses even hair-salon pros, one that will solve any problem around blowing & setting of your hair!
description: “Ceramic Brush” Vess Co., Ltd. has developed is made from safe materials that keep cleanliness and beauty for you. 【Cautions】 - Do not expose the brush to a dryer’s heat for minutes or pour hot water onto it, which may damage it. - Do not directly put hair dressing on it, which may disfigure or damage it. - When you see it getting obviously dirty, wash it with lukewarm water with neutral detergent dissolved in it and rinse it well. Then, wipe completely (take out water from it) and dry it under the shade with its cut-hair part pointing to the floor.
